genresAdvancedInfo.name: experimental poetry
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Experimental poetry is a genre that seeks to push the boundaries of traditional poetry by incorporating unconventional writing techniques, structures, and subject matter. It often explores themes of identity, politics, and social justice, and is known for its willingness to challenge traditional literary conventions. This genre is characterized by its experimental approach to language and its willingness to push the boundaries of what is considered "poetry."

index.head-title: Spotify Top artists and songs - Stats about your music on Spotify
index.head-description: Generate statistics about the music you play more often on Spotify. Your top artists, songs, and genres.
index.what-is-spotify-top-content: The {strongOpen}easiest{strongClose} way to get stats about your listening history on Spotify. Find out and share your {strongOpen}top artists{strongClose}, {strongOpen}tracks{strongClose}, and {strongOpen}genres{strongClose}.
